item.title: [DISTRELEC-5902] OCI // Deactivate Mega Fly Out
item.description:
We should be able to activate/deactivate the mega fly out per customer in the HMC customer configuration.
Please add a flag.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I added the global model attribute named :

megaFlyOutDisabled

this attribute is "true" if we should hide the mega flyout, false otherwise.

Could you please complete the FE part?
Thx.
I will do it right now..I had to finish the Video Player first..
Frontend is done, however can I not test it locally since the param is always false. @Nabil, please test it on your machine.

Tested by Nabil. Works. Can be tested after next deployment.

When testing, its Important to Flush the OS Cache, otherwise, it does not work!!!

should I Implement this for all search pages (i.e., search page, 3L category page, manufacturer page, etc. ) ? or just the search page (i.e., when the use enter something in the search text field)?

Hi,

Affected pages:

  • Search Page
  • Manufacturer Page
  • 3L Category Page
  • New store page
  • Outlet store Page
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5758] OCI-DE Problems with html Tags in Longsdescription
item.description:
Customer has a problem with the html tags in the longdescription, can we replace them?

Customer configuration ID (95ec5d2f-2c90-44f4-b817-958f81bf0e66)

I deativated the longdescription in the configuration. You can reactivate it for testing

https://www.distrelec.de/ociEntry?username=mpi-de-ger@oci.distrelec&password=skdh539&oci_version=4.0&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0
item.summary: OCI-DE Problems with html Tags in Longsdescription

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please modify this to a customer specific configuration.
We should be able to configure this on customer level.
I added a flag to the "OCICustomerConfig" to tell if we should encode the long description or not. So now it is customer specific.
fixed

Hello Nabil,

Can you show me where you added the flag? thanks

Hi Oliver,

the flag is added to the OCI Customer Config directly (see screenshot)
This feature will be available only after next deployment to Q and P.
Hi Nabil, in witch system (p or q) cannot see it in both systems
When is the next deployment? Customer is waiting
today we will deploy to Q. The deployment to P could be on Thursday.
P Deployment will take place tonight.

testet in q system this morning no changes in longtext see pictures.

function is not availible in p system today
Please test on Q now.

Cannot see a change. Maybe i do something wrong? See two pictures.

please test your own:

http://test.distrelec.de/ociEntry?username=mpi-de-ger@oci.distrelec&password=skdh539&oci_version=4.0&hook_url=https://www.elfa.se/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet

Customer ID: 2c4a94ba-d89d-440e-8af0-95ff7ef3d5ca

tested in live system. Function is not OK.
Customer (MPI) is waiting for the new shop.
MPI is a big customer!

Please solve this today! I have to call the customer.

Nabil,
I have tested as well. It doesn't work.
Please check it.

Oliver,
How exactly should the Longdescription look like?
For example: [Typ] - [Shortdescription] ?

Hello Florian,

I think the Problem is "<br />" i would replace it through ", "

If this is not possible i would generate a new Longdescr out of Type, Manufacturer and Shortdescription

Article 11075376
This is now:

NEW_ITEM-LONGTEXT_1:132[]
Bezeichnung: Oszilloskop<br />Abmessungen L x B x H: 125 x 327 x 158 mm<br />Vertikale Empfindlichkeit/div: 2 mV...5 V/div<br />Zeitbasis: 2.5 ns/div...50 s/div<br />Gewicht: 2 kg<br />AusfÃ¼hrung: Tisch<br />Display: 7" TFT-LCD<br />Eingang: Impedanz Ohm: 1 MOhm<br />Eingang: Kopplung: AC/DC/GND<br />GerÃ¤tefunktionen: FrequenzzÃ¤hler<br />Lieferung mit: 1 Tastkopf/Kanal/Dokumentations-CD/Netzkabel/Kalibrierzertifikat<br />Mathematikfunktionen: Addition/FFT/Subtraktion/Multiplikation<br />Messfunktionen: Logger-Funktion/TastverhÃ¤ltnis Funktion (Duty cycle)/Maskentest/Min/Max-Funktion<br />Schnittstellen: USB<br />Serie: TBS1000B<br />Sicherheitsstandard EN 61010: CAT II 300 V<br />Stromversorgung: 100...240 V @ 50...60 Hz<br />Trigger: Auto/Edge/Impulsbreite/Video/Single/Stop

This could be future:

NEW_ITEM-LONGTEXT_1:132[]
Bezeichnung: Oszilloskop, Abmessungen L x B x H: 125 x 327 x 158 mm, Vertikale Empfindlichkeit/div: 2 mV...5 V/div, Zeitbasis: 2.5 ns/div...50 s/div, Gewicht: 2 kg, AusfÃ¼hrung: Tisch, Display: 7" TFT-LCD, Eingang: Impedanz Ohm: 1 MOhm, Eingang: Kopplung: AC/DC/GND, GerÃ¤tefunktionen: FrequenzzÃ¤hler, Lieferung mit: 1 Tastkopf/Kanal/Dokumentations-CD/Netzkabel/Kalibrierzertifikat, Mathematikfunktionen: Addition/FFT/Subtraktion/Multiplikation, Messfunktionen: Logger-Funktion/TastverhÃ¤ltnis Funktion (Duty cycle)/Maskentest/Min/Max-Funktion, Schnittstellen: USB, Serie: TBS1000B, Sicherheitsstandard EN 61010: CAT II 300 V, Stromversorgung: 100...240 V @ 50...60 Hz, Trigger: Auto/Edge/Impulsbreite/Video/Single/Stop

Hi Oliver,
What is it exactly? Product description?
We need the exact naming of the attributes.

I think the Problem is "<br />" i would replace it through ", "

YES, this should be possible. However, we need to know exactly what is the attribute name.

Hello Nabil,

This feature should only affect NEW_ITEM-LONGTEXT_1:132[]. I don't know the exact name of this attribute. But it is the product description

Maybe it is possible to find out with the article number.
In this case it is "11075376" and the attribute has the following text: Bezeichnung: Oszilloskop<br />Abmessungen L x B x H: 125 x 327 x 158 mm<br />............

Hi Oliver,

could you test it on the test system please

tested on q system. funktion is not ok. please see with this credentials:
(screenshot 4)

http://test.distrelec.de/ociEntry?username=mpi-de-ger@oci.distrelec&password=skdh539&oci_version=4.0&hook_url=https://www.elfa.se/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet
Please test after next deployment.
tested in q system. looks good. please transfer to live system

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5562] Key Attribute don't shown correctly - DISTEPLA-1082470
item.description:
Feedback from category management:

URL of the page where error / mistake was found
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Stiftleiste-2-x40P-Prostar-SD-2MM-2X40-G/p/14379111?q=2x4&filter_Category3=Industriesteckverbinder&filter_Polzahl=2&page=1&origPos=234&origPageSize=10&simi=90.96

OS / Type of Device
MS Windows 7/ PC,MS Windows 8/ PC,MS Windows 8.1/ PC
Browser used
Internet Explorer 8,Internet Explorer 9,Internet Explorer 10

Description
Shop doesn't show polenumber correct. example: 2x40 pole is shown in title as 2x40 pole, but in technical section the Attribute Shows: 2 pole. Also on the search function in the left it shows 2 pole, which is totally wrong! It's the most important waregroup regarding turnover and Profit!
item.environment:
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Stiftleiste-2-x40P-Prostar-SD-2MM-2X40-G/p/14379111?q=2x4&filter_Category3=Industriesteckverbinder&filter_Polzahl=2&page=1&origPos=234&origPageSize=10&simi=90.96

Technical attributes in product detail page
item.summary: Key Attribute don't shown correctly - DISTEPLA-1082470

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Kris
this is an old issue about the embedded number value in the pim export file.

For this product in the pim export xml file, the value of the Polzahl attribute is this one

              <MultiValue AttributeID="Polzahl_emb_num">
                <Value><prefix> </prefix> 2<suffix> x40</suffix></Value>
              </MultiValue>

As you can see the text value of the <Value> node is 2.
That's why in hybris only the value 2 is imported, the prefix and suffix are ignored.

We have to decide together with the pim team how to proceed.

discussed with francesco. he will inform me, if they have a solution.
thnx
please assign it to francesco back. thank you.

As agreed with Adrian and Patrick we're going to implement the mapping following this rule:

attribute value = prefix value + text value + suffix value

Example: 

<Value><prefix>+</prefix> 2<suffix> x40</suffix></Value>

Will produce the following result: + 2x40
thank you for that info. can you tell me when we will have this solution?

Hi Francesco
When can we test it? Is it implemented now?
Thank you. Br, kris

Hi JW
we're implementing the change as discussed in our last meeting.

Here the summary of the implementation.

For Embedded attributes:

  • all the embedded attributes will be imported as string
  • all the embedded attributes will be marked as "D" attributes (will not be used for facets)
    On the pim import side is not possible to mark the embedded attributes as "D" attributes.
    These attributes should be marked as "D" in the pim. In this way they will be imported in the right way in hybris.
  • the value will be calculated as: <prefix> + <text value> + <unit> + <suffix>

Notes: On the pim import side is not possible to mark the embedded attributes as "D" attributes.
These attributes should be marked as "D" in the pim. In this way they will be imported in the right way in hybris.

For Calculated attributes:

  • the calculated attributes are identified with Derived="true"
  • if the attribute contains a unit then the value will be calculated as: <text value> + <unit>
  • if the attribute doesn't contain a unit then the value will be calculated as : <text value>

Embedded attributes - aee attached screen shot
Imported as string : ok

Webuse code
If it is marked as A, mark it as D. If it is B, C or D do not change anything. In Attribute Definition, you know that it is an embedded :
Attribute ID="TA_EmbNummer_A" MultiValued="false" DefaultUnitID="unece.unit.VLT" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false">
<Name>EmbNummerMitEH</Name>
<Validation BaseType="embedded_number"

To display
Format is <Value AttributeID="TA_EmbNummer_A" UnitID="unece.unit.2Z"><prefix>Highway to hell </prefix>10.52<suffix>@ High Voltage</suffix></value>

Display following string : Highway to hell 10.52 mV @ High Voltage

Calculated Attribute : ok
Do you need more examples?

J-W
Embedded in XML

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5232] SEO - Redirection - Wrong redirection behavior for /lang/manufaturer/*/man_*
item.description:
Observations :

  • Those url :
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/en/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/de/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre
  • Are redirected in 301 to
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre

Impacts :

  • The language dedicated page are destroyed for Googlebot.
  • Those 301 lead to a content modification on the last redirected page http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre.
    Which also destroy the ranking potential of this last page.

Demands :

  • Don't make any redirection from those url pattern :
    • /en/manufacturer/*/man_*
    • /de/manufacturer/*/man_*
    • /fr/manufacturer/*/man_*

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be marked as closed without my approval after a check in production environment.
  • Thank you to update the status of the commit and deployment in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - Redirection - Wrong redirection behavior for /lang/manufaturer/*/man_*

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please test tomorrow in production, in test it works.

Great news !
But, thank you to not deploy seo functionality without my validation after my check on Q...
Because of this action, their is side effect errors on production !!!
The pages are not redirected anymore as expected which is good,
but those new manufacturer language pages create huge seo anomaly because of buggy alternate metatag,

Exemple 1 :

Live on Production : http://www.distrelec.ch/en/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre" hreflang="x-default" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en" hreflang="en-ch" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de" hreflang="de-ch" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr" hreflang="fr-ch" />
Expected : http://www.distrelec.ch/en/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre" hreflang="x-default" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre" hreflang="en-ch" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre" hreflang="de-ch" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre" hreflang="fr-ch" />

Exemple 2 :

Live on Production : http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre" hreflang="x-default" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en" hreflang="en-ch" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de" hreflang="de-ch" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr" hreflang="fr-ch" />
Expected : http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre" hreflang="x-default" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre" hreflang="en-ch" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre" hreflang="de-ch" />
	<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/manufacturer/dremel/man_dre" hreflang="fr-ch" />

Thank you to take action ASAP !
(roll back of the function or fixing of the issue, you can choose...)

Hi.
Thx. It is already deployed to Production. I can't help out with that.
But we could fix that issues.

Hi Pierre,
redirection is now correct and the default link defintion is now fixed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5921] Roche OCI: lasting layout problems
item.description:
After several fixes, Roche ist still not able to order over OCI.

See: DISTRELEC-5713 (OCI Documentmode IE5 Quirks Problem)

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
A solution could be to break out of the iFrame and avoid to be rendered in IE5 Quirks-Mode.

Approach:

  • Make tis feature configurable via OCI-customer configuration
  • After successful login, first render a JavaScript to open an new Window/Tab or to replace the top-location with the success-page

The process with a new window/tab works for the customer.
Please implement this asap.

Hi,

I added two attributes to the OCI customer config:

 openInNewWindow and defaultRedirectURL

.

During the login phase, the redirect URL will get a parameter of type boolean called 

newWindow

.
According to its value, the frame should be open in a new window or in the same window.
BE task done.

Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

Hi
The first window/tab should be opened directly in the cart.
This is not the case at the moment.

You can try it with: https://test.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=webmaster@distrelec.com&password=123456&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0

• Current tab will be refreshed and redirected to: "home/cart"
  • New tab will be opened in "home"

Please retest
Will be tested by Roche on Firday December 11th.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4623] SEO - Sitemap Issues - Full sitemap + alternate language to provide
item.description:
Observations :

  • For every website on the hybris plateform we are using sitemaps (https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/156184?hl=en)
  • We host one index of sitemap (http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml) which list all the sitemaps (http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap1.xml.gz).
  • Those sitemap are respecting google sitemap index formating (https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/75712?rd=1&hl=en) and "general url" sitemaps formating (https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/183668?hl=en&ref_topic=6080646&rd=1).
    sample_sitemap_index.xml
    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<sitemapindex xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9">
	<sitemap>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap1.xml.gz</loc>
		<lastmod>2014-09-30T03:49:22.642+02:00</lastmod>
	</sitemap>
</sitemapindex>
    sample_sitemap1.xml
    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" >
	<url>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Isolation-%C3%B8-2-mm-weiss-Multi-Contact-KT2-F-withe/p/14048066</loc>
		<lastmod>2014-09-22</lastmod>
	</url>
</urlset>
  • We can find inside the current distrelec.ch sitemaps :
    • Product url for German language (http://www.distrelec.ch/de/*/p/idproduct : sitemap1~8.xml)
    • Category url for German language (http://www.distrelec.ch/de/*/*/*/*/c/cat-idcat : sitemap8.xml)
  • We don't provide the other major pattern of landing pages :
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L1D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L2D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L2-3D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L3D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-D*-idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/manufacturer/brand-name
  • 55% of the url proposed inside the sitemap lead to 302 redirections : http://www.distrelec.ch/de/PVC-Starkstromlitze,-H05-V-K-0,75-qmm-dbl----/p/90040410 -302> http://www.distrelec.ch/de/PVC-Starkstromlitze%2C-H05-V-K-0%2C75-qmm-dbl-kabeltronik---660107512/p/serviceplus/90040410
  • 50% of product url are "service +" products : serviceplus/90040410" class="external-link" rel="nofollow">http://www.distrelec.ch/de/PVC-Starkstromlitze%2C-H05-V-K-0%2C75-qmm-dbl-kabeltronik---660107512/p/serviceplus/90040410
  • Language alternatives of all the landing pages, are not proposed.
    GoogleBot crawl ratio on the language structure of our pages :

Impacts :

  • By providing incomplete or wrong information about our landing pages, we drastically limit the crawlers comprehension of our structure and the positive effect of sitemaps.

Demands :

  • Provide only those landing page type absolute path inside sitemaps :
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L1D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L2D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L2-3D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L3D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-D*-idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-M*-idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/product-id
  • Don't provide :
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/cms/*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/cms/*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/search
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/checkToggles
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/cart
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/checkout
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/my-account
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/login
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/import-tool
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/support
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/feedback
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/medias/sys_master/*.js
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/*.js
    • http://www.distrelec.ch//app/etc/local.xml
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/medias/sys_master/*.gz
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/gsitemap*.xml.gz
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/serviceplus/*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/ServicePlusShop/*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/*/alsoBought*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/*/recommendation*
      ...
  • All url provided must be final url (no redirections between).
  • Provide all the products but not the "/p/serviceplus/*" products.
  • Provide every language equivalent for every url, example with http://www.distrelec.ch/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509
    exemple_sitemap_language_alternate.xml
    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset 
	xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9"
	xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
 	<url>
		<lastmod>YYYY-MM-DD</lastmod>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509</loc>
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="fr" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
	</url>
	<url>
		<lastmod>YYYY-MM-DD</lastmod>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509</loc>
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="fr" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
	</url>
	<url>
		<lastmod>YYYY-MM-DD</lastmod>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509</loc>
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="fr" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
	</url>
	<url>
		<lastmod>YYYY-MM-DD</lastmod>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/c/cat-L1D_379509</loc>
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
	</url>
</urlset>
  • Xml tags details
    Tag Description
    <urlset> Encloses all information about the set of URLs included in the Sitemap.
    <url> Encloses all information about a specific URL.
    <loc> Specifies the URL.
    <lastmod> The date the URL was last modifed, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD format (time value is optional).
  • For data analitycs, sitemaps must be splitted by url pattern :
    Exemple :
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_product_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat-L1D_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat-L2D_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat-L2-3D_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat-L3D_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat-D_1.xml.gz (put /c/cat-DC-id, /c/cat-DD-id, /c/cat-MG-id)
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_manufacturer_1.xml.gz
  • For crawlers comprehension, a sitemap file can contain no more than 50,000 URLs and must be no larger than 10MB when uncompressed.
    If it's the case, split the sitemap by 50k part and modify the suffix "_incremental-number" at every splited sitemap starting by "_1" for the first sitemap and "_2" for the second etc...
    Edit : The alternate data make the sitemap a lot heavier, to comply to the rule of no more than 50k and no more than 10MB, we will split them by 15k of url.
  • Every new sitemap generated must be indicated inside the sitemap index : http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - Sitemap Issues - Full sitemap + alternate language to provide

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment: @Francesco : I've add an introduction about the sitemaps, if you read it you will have a better understanding of the context.

Hi Pierre
i've generated a sitemap with the Top Categories and with the alternate languages.
Could you please check the file attached?

The file has been generated for CH site only.
I'm checking, thx !

It start to look very nice !

In yellow the highlighted small dev server display bug :

  • Don't forget the "www"
  • /en/german-content is not good
  • the xdefault url miss a / between the domain and the url path inside the alternate
  • xml indentation of the xhtml:link tag
  • test domain
For the new sitemap version, the sitemap split per url pattern won't be implemented (too short on time). It will done in a second time.
(all issue fixed)
So that means we can set this task on resolved?

No, it's still in developement.
"(all issue fixed)" was about the previous comment.

Francesco will assign the status resolved when it will be.

Hi Pierre,
i've created a separate branch (feature-fbe-4623-seo-sitemap) for this issue.
In this way we can test this issue separately on the Atos Quality system without affecting the live system

Today i'll try to deploy on Atos Q
Ok, perfect thanks !

Hi Pierre
today i've realized that the requirement you've defined about the file names is very difficult to implement.
My proposal is to implement the creation of the sitemap files like this:

http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_product_1.xml.gz
http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_product_2.xml.gz

http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat_1.xml.gz
http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat_2.xml.gz
http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat_3.xml.gz

http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_manufacturer_1.xml.gz
http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_manufacturer_2.xml.gz

What is really hard to get is the categories splitted in files based on the category level.

If the category split is to complex for now, we can come back after as we said.

(I am testing on http://test.a.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml right now)

Chek on http://test.a.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml :

1) All the product alternate have german url. Is it possible to provide the final url with the dedicated language description ?

sitemap 11

    <xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/en/Gabelkoppler-2-mm-50-mA-30-V-20-mA--25-%2B85-%C2%B0C-Omron-EE-SX1018/p/17540628" /> 
  </url>

2) Url pattern

http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-idcat : 344161 found, divided by 4 alternate = 86040, divided by 4 language = 21510 (weird, to check)
http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/* : 0 Found (NOK)
http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/product-id : 1771344 Found, divided by 4 alternate = 442836, divided by 4 language = 110709 (NOK, expected to be ~165K)

Hi Pierre,
with the current version i've fixed the product name with the right language.
The sitemaps inside http://test.a.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml are not available (404 or 500).

Test on sample 5000 products :

200 : 4719 (95%)
404 : 37 (0.1%) (no pattern)
301 : 243 (5%) (redirected to EOL : 32, redirected to rewritten product content with the same pid : 211 (difference is encoding of non encoded "-" in sitemap))

Test on sample 5000 category

200 : 4719 (95%)
404 : 0
301 : 263 (5%) (redirected to rewritten product content with the same pid (difference is encoding of non encoded "-" in sitemap))

1 minor encoding issue found on sitemap :
http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Universal-housing-222-x-125-x-81-mm-silver-grey-RAL-7001-Aluminium-Fibox-ALN-122208-COMPLETE/p/15001789
=301>
http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Universal-housing-222-x-125-x-81-mm-silver-grey-%28RAL-7001%29-Aluminium-Fibox-ALN-122208-COMPLETE/p/15001789

  • How it is wrote on sitemaps :
    strreplace((url), "all special char", "-")
  • How it is wrote on the website :
    strreplace((urlencode(url)), "%20", "-")

This is a minor issue, it can go live with it

1 major issue found on the content :
(related to https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5474)
Inside the test sitemap we provide : (xdefault url content = language content of origin page, here it's english content)

sitemap in q
<url>
	<loc>http://test.a.distrelec.ch/en/Components/Enclosures-Fans-PCB-Boards/19-Enclosures/U-Profiles/U-Profiles%2C-with-Cut-out-for-Micro-Switch/c/cat-579171</loc>
	<lastmod>2014-10-27</lastmod>
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Geh%C3%A4use-L%C3%BCfter-Leiterplatten/19---Anlagen/U-Profile/U-Profile%2C-mit-Ausschnitt-f%C3%BCr-Mikroschalter/c/cat-579171" />
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="fr" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/Bo%C3%AEtiers-Ventilateurs-Circuits-imprim%C3%A9s/Bo%C3%AEtiers-19-/U-Profiles/Profils-en-U%2C-avec-d%C3%A9coupe-pour-microrupteur/c/cat-579171" />
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/Components/Enclosures-Fans-PCB-Boards/19-Enclosures/U-Profiles/U-Profiles%2C-with-Cut-out-for-Micro-Switch/c/cat-579171" />
</url>

What we need : (use the shop defaut language as the xdefault language for content, here it's german)

sitemap we need
<url>
	<loc>http://test.a.distrelec.ch/en/Components/Enclosures-Fans-PCB-Boards/19-Enclosures/U-Profiles/U-Profiles%2C-with-Cut-out-for-Micro-Switch/c/cat-579171</loc>
	<lastmod>2014-10-27</lastmod>
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Geh%C3%A4use-L%C3%BCfter-Leiterplatten/19---Anlagen/U-Profile/U-Profile%2C-mit-Ausschnitt-f%C3%BCr-Mikroschalter/c/cat-579171" />
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="fr" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/Bo%C3%AEtiers-Ventilateurs-Circuits-imprim%C3%A9s/Bo%C3%AEtiers-19-/U-Profiles/Profils-en-U%2C-avec-d%C3%A9coupe-pour-microrupteur/c/cat-579171" />
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/Geh%C3%A4use-L%C3%BCfter-Leiterplatten/19---Anlagen/U-Profile/U-Profile%2C-mit-Ausschnitt-f%C3%BCr-Mikroschalter/c/cat-579171" />
</url>

This is a major problem, going live with it will impact the quality of the structure

1 minor issue on <last mod> tag for categories :
this tag contain bad data.
The tag <last mod> is an optional instruction, it's better to have it with correct data but if the implementation is to hard, we can remove it.

(<last mod> tag on /c/ removed)

Crawl result on a random 500 url of all sitemaps of the last version :

40% of 301, that's really bad, this issue at 5% was minor at 40% it's critic
And it's only about the encoding issue
encoding issue.xlsx
http://www.diffnow.com/?report=8ipfg

4 pattern of 301 :

  • Majuscules difference (manufacturer)
  • Encoding difference (global) (we need, urlencode, then replace "%20" to "-")
  • Missing information (manufacturer on products url)
  • no lang on xdefault (normal) (global)

It's to late to add this functionnality and deploy,
We will do this week 45.

Manufacturer error :

=301>
http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Self-d%27accumulation-20-mH-0-5-A-W%C3%BCrth-Elektronik-744821120/p/15857851

The sitemap has been temporary disabled in production with the following redirection rule:

#delete this line when the sitemap will be ready.
RewriteRule ^/sitemap.*$ / [R=302,L]

On quality the job has finally produced the right sitemap files.
you can access these files with this url:
http://test.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml

On production there is the same version as well, even if the tempoarary redirection rule is redirecting all the sitemap requests to home with 302.
But the sitemap file can be easly checked accessing this url:
http://10.191.20.141:9001/sitemap_index.xml?site=distrelec-ch

Please let me know if you find additional issues.

Francesco

    • pattern "/" instead of "-" (exemple : lign 228)

Hi Pierre
i've found and solved most of these errors.
In the next release v3.0.11 these changes will be available.

ok great news !
Tell me when it's deployed, I'll do a checkup.

Last days of email compiled here :

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Monday 20/11/14 :

checkup of the Monday sitemap :

  • Category :
    • Counts : OK
    • Counts alternate : OK
    • Redirections : 100% 404
      miss written lang separator "/" with "-" :
      exemple :
      <url>
      <loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/fr-Automatisation-Commutation---Mesure-et-comptage---Surveillance---Commande---Appareils-de-signalisation-Minuteries-Minuteries-pour-prise-secteur-Time-switch%2C-24-hrs/c/cat-177642</loc>
      <xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de-Automation-Schalt----Mess--und-Z%C3%A4hl----%C3%9Cberwachungs----Befehls----Meldeger%C3%A4te-Schaltuhren-Steckdosenschaltuhren-Time-switch%2C-24-hrs/c/cat-177642" />
      <xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de-Automation-Schalt----Mess--und-Z%C3%A4hl----%C3%9Cberwachungs----Befehls----Meldeger%C3%A4te-Schaltuhren-Steckdosenschaltuhren-Time-switch%2C-24-hrs/c/cat-177642" />
      <xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en-Automation-Switching---Metering-%26-Counting---Monitoring---Command---Signalling-Devices-Clock-Relays-Plug-in-socket-type-timers-Time-switch%2C-24-hrs/c/cat-177642" />
      </url>
  • crawl test with the replace of "/lang-" by "/lang/"
    • 98% of 301 redirections :
      here is the diff : http://www.diffnow.com/?report=vsfit
      • lign 1 : wrong replace of category breadcrumb path "/ " by "-"
      • lign 21 : need replace of "---" by "-"
  • Products :
    • Counts : OK
    • Counts alternate : OK
    • Redirection : Optimizable, reduced from 60% (last sitemap) to 15%, it's great !
      here is the diff : http://www.diffnow.com/?report=71vbj
      -​ lign 47 : need replace of "/" by "-"
      -​ lign 43 : need replace of "---" by "-"
      • lign 55 : need replace of "-/-" by "-"
  • Manufacturer :
    • count : Ok
    • count alternate : Ok
    • redirection : Ok

---------------------------------------------------------
Wednesday 19/11/14 :

checkup of the Wednesday sitemap :

  • Here is the diff of the 301 found in my sample on category sitemap :
    http://www.diffnow.com/?report=6ex9d
  • patterns :
    • lign 35 : "-" instead of "--" (mainly on distrelec.ch/de) (25% of the 301)
    • lign 1 : redirection of the 0 language to the language (25% of the 301, not an issue, normal behavior)
  • Which make only 6% off undesired redirection !!!
    Just apply the same rule on product for encoding and we are good for a go live \o/

    http://www.distrelec.ch/en/manufacturer/Omron/man-omr
    http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/Advanced-Thermal-Solutions/man-ats
    http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/manufacturer/Tente/man-ten
  • Category sitemap (30% of 301, on a random sample of 500) (nok):
    diff :
    http://www.diffnow.com/?report=85jap
    main patterns :
    • "--" sent, "-" expected.
  • Product (16% of 301, on a random sample of 500) (ok, optimizable):
    diff :
    http://www.diffnow.com/?report=85jap
    • "/" sent, "-" expected,
    • "--" sent, "-" expected.

=> Sitemap not ready for Google :(

@Francesco :
Check on local sitemap :

  • Manufacturer (99% of 200 on a sample of 1k of url) (ok)
  • Category (55% of 301 on a sample of 1k of url) (nok)
    • diff : http://www.diffnow.com/?report=qeuwz
    • patterns :
      • "--" expected, "-" sent (lign 34)
      • missing category breadcrumb nodes (lign 49)
  • Product (60% of 301 on a sample of 1k of url) (nok)
    • diff : http://www.diffnow.com/?report=ms6nf
    • patterns :
      • missing product title data
      • missing brand data

=> Not ready for Google, but issues could be related to local environnement

Ok, code commited,
will be available in Q at next deploy.
When will it be deployed on Q ?

it's currently on Q.
The sitemap generation is runnning

@Francesco :
Check on Q sitemap :

  • Manufacturer (99% of 200 on a random sample of 1k of url) (ok)
  • Category (99% of 200 on a random sample of 1k of url) (ok)
  • Product (15% of 301 on a random sample of 1k of url) (ok)

=> Ready for Google on Hidden Prod

good news.
i'll inform you when the release will be in prod.

@Francesco :
Check on Q sitemap coutn of products :

Manufacturer : 1265
Category : 41222
Product : 165000

Exact number on product, it's strange. You should check.

@Francesco :

Check on Hidden Production Sitemap :

Count :

  • number of category : 41 233 (OK)
  • number of manufacturer : 1 291 (OK)
  • number of products : 180 000 (NOK, expecting ~170k, without an exact number)

Crawl :

  • crawl random sample 1k categories : (OK, 98% 200)
  • crawl random sample 1k manufacturer : (OK, 97% 200)
  • crawl random sample 1k products : (OK, 81% 200, optimizable)
    • diff : http://www.diffnow.com/?report=a5vyi
    • pattern diff :
      • "--" sent, expecting "-" (lign 136)
      • "/" sent, expecting "-" (lign 151)
      • "/-" sent, expecting "-" (lign 165)

@ Francesco :

I found another issue, 20% of the category url result into a "0 results page".
Are you using category level with product available or all category level without distinction ?
sample : http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/attachment/15785/sample%200%20result%20cat.txt

(Or It could be related to this not properly fixed issue : http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5894)

@ Francesco :

  • Concerning the "0 results page" I have created another ticket about it.
    http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5960.
    This is the only clean way to deal with it from the SEO point of view.
  • For the sitemap, the quick win would be to leave it like it is, and I provide you an exclusion list of the category I don't want (easy to generate for me, easy to exclude for you).

@ Francesco :
New issue found :
On category sitemap 100% of cat-L* have a 404 due to a little mistake, "-" is sent but "_" is expected :
Exemple :
Url provided : http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/Relais-%26-Schalter/Printrelais/c/cat-L3D-525370
Url expected : http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/Relais-%26-Schalter/Printrelais/c/cat-L3D_525370

Seen with Francesco, it's been corrected

Seen with Francesco, Bugged pages inside sitemaps excludable with a blacklist.
Subtask here : http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5969
Once the "180k of product" issue & "_" fix deployed, we will be able to show it for google (blacklist for mid December/January).

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4593] SEO - URL Duplications Issues - Between Manufacturer - 301 to add and db to clean
item.description:
Observations :

  • On http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/, several manufacturers seems duplicated :
  • CRITICAL UPDATE 27/07/14 : On http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/acculux product contents have disappeared and "Manufacturer not found" message appear.

Impacts :

  • SEO :
    • This bug create pure DUST (Different URLs, Similar Text) duplicate.
    • That lead into duplication of content, waste of crawl and finally not be ranked properly inside the search engine result pages.
  • CRITICAL UPDATE 27/07/14 : SEM/Emailing/Marketing :
    • All campaign that target manufacturer landing page lead to empty landing pages

Demands :

  • Removal of the wrong anchor and links on http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/ : NOK
  • For tracking purpose, the tracking suffix shouldn’t get lost during the redirections : NOK
  • EDIT : 05/08/14 : SAP manufacturer id force us to make a compromise on the manufacturer url behavior,
    we will have to redirect in http 301 all cropped manufacturer name url and their one original url to this pattern "http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/full_brand_name/sap_cropped_brand_name
    • Exemple :
      • http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/acculux -301> http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/acculux/aul :NOK
      • http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/aul -301> http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/acculux/aul : NOK
  • EDIT 28/08/14 : http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer to fix

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - URL Duplications Issues - Between Manufacturer - 301 to add and db to clean

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
Live check :

  • Removal of the wrong anchor and links : OK
  • 301 redirect of the wrong manufacturer : NOK linked to https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4597 issue N°7

=> Reopening of the issue

Live check 28/07/14 :
- Removal of the wrong anchor and links : NOK, still wrong links on the page
- 301 redirect of the wrong manufacturer : NOK

New evolution, all the good url (exemple http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/acculux) are now providing an error "Manufacturer not found" and no content on the page.
As requested previously, we must keep the full naming structure for the manufacturer and redirect in http 301 the cropped named pages to the full named once.
Product content must appear on the full named manufacturer pages ASAP !

These are the manufacturers that are listed in the footer, but not available in the system:

===Start statistic of manufacturers===
Manufacturers listed in manufacturer page [1347]

Manufacturer [ban_boehler] does not exist.
Manufacturer [sony] does not exist.
Manufacturer [amprobe] does not exist.
Manufacturer [brother] does not exist.
===End statistic of manufacturers===

I've created the ticket DISTRELEC-4688 to change the content of the footer.

On the current version I cannot find any duplicated manufacturer.
Manufacturer Accuride only occurs once (/manufacturer/acu)

The manufacturer have been deduplicated, but only the bad one have been kept :

We just need :
1 - The content back on the /manufacturer/not-cropped-named (exemple : http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/acculux)
2 - The links to the /manufacturer/not-cropped-named on the /manufacturer/ page (exemple : http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/acculux)
3 - 301 redirect from /manufacturer/cropped-named to /manufacturer/not-cropped-named (exemple : http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/acc -301> http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/acculux)

Live check :
NOK
Florian, for this i need the list of the list of the mapping between the "old" manufacturer code and the new one.
https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4689

Here the description of the solution.

The old PIM manufacturer code is now deprecated (eg: for Bosch the manufacturer code was bosch)
www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/bosch
The new SAP manufacturer code is now used (eg: for Bosh the new manufacturer code is bsh)
www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/bsh

To make the maufacturer url SEO compliant we will add the manufacturer name to the url in that way: www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/[manufacturer-name]/[manufacturer-code]
For Bosch the manufacturer url will look like this:
www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/BOSCH/bsh
This URL will be exposed everywhere in the webshop as new canonical URL, in this way will be crawled.

Here the note about redirects:

  • OLD url will be redirected to the new CANONICAL url
    This is useful because the search engines still have the old urls
    Example: www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/bosch ----> www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/BOSCH/bsh
  • NEW url will be redirected to the new CANONICAL url
    This because internally the webshop will refer only to the new url
    Example: www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/bsh----> www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/BOSCH/bsh

@francesco : Thx, for the details.
For the rewritten url, it's highly preferable to avoid capital letter.
Capital letter inside url just lead to side effect and maintenance problems in SEO and linking.
Exemple :
Bad : www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/BOSCH/bsh
Good : www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/bosch/bsh

Implementation is done
What is missing is to finalize the apache redirects for old->new manufacturer codes.

Thank you Francesco, that's great !
Tell me when you need me to do the check on http://test.distrelec.ch
Please test, thanks!

Checklist :

  • http://test.distrelec.ch/manufacturer : all the manufacturer link anchor on the page replaced " " by "+", we don't want this replacement : NOK
  • http://test.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/accuride : they should be a 301 redirect to http://test.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/accuride/man_acu : NOK
  • http://test.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/acu : 301 redirect to http://test.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/accuride/man_acu : OK
  • http://test.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/accuride/man_acu : there is a prefixe "man_" iniside the url, if possible, remove it : (see with francesco, not possible to remove) OK

Hi Pierre
I assume we cannot go live with this right?

It's possible to go live since it will be the same situation (just a 301 from the bugged manufacturer page to the new manufacturer pages).
But it is indeed preferable to go live with everything operational. (the 301 from the old manufacturer page to the the ones)

When is it planned to do the redirection from the legacy manufacturer page to new one /manufacturer/*/man_* ?
(this update is just a load of rules inside the htacess...)
The old manufacturer page redirection are still not operational, I reopen.

Francesco don't have the data to implement the old to new manufacturer redirections.

It has to be done by the PIM manager, to check with Önder.

@Francesco :
Please find redirections rules.xlsx file joined.
http://jira.distrelec.ch/secure/attachment/15248/redirections%20rules.xlsx
These are the redirections rules to use on all hybris websites.
To avoid non desired overlapping rules, those manufacturer rules must be placed at the beggining of the existing manufacturer rules (the old once will be used as a fallback).
@Francesco : What is the status ?

New issue :
The old url are not redirected anymore :

  • Production :
    http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/aul = 200
  • Expected :
    http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/aul =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/Acculux/man_aul
The redirection was modified and it was wrong. Now i've restored the right rule.

Thank you, when will it be deployed ?

By the way, when is it planned to implement this :
http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4593?focusedCommentId=27080&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-27080
